review: I was fully satisfied.  He  treats his patients with utmost care.  My son had a problem  of  overfilling after RCT which was done in a clinic near my residence.  After consulting  so many doctors finally I  heard about Dr. Gopi Krishna 'S  Microscopic procedure. He cleared the overfilling  and  one nerve also which was not removed earlier.  Now my son doesn't  feel any pain after Re-RCT. Thanks to Dr.  Gopi Krishna

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I was pleasantly surprised by the follow up after the procedure. The following morning I was contacted by the dentist to check if the procedure has caused pain or bleeding. The filling was well done, so I had no discomfort. Anyway an appointment was fixed so that the dentist could check if all was well. Next, another appointment with the senior dentist for a final check up. I am very impressed with their professionalism & care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had an exceptional experience at the Root canal foundation and felt compelled to share. From the moment I walked in, the staff greeted me warmly, creating a welcoming atmosphere that immediately put me at ease.

Dr. Gopikrishna himself is not only highly skilled but also incredibly compassionate. He took the time to thoroughly explain each step of the procedure, addressing all of my concerns and ensuring I felt comfortable throughout. His attention to detail and commitment to patient care truly set him apart.

The office itself is modern and well-maintained, with state-of-the-art equipment that enhances the overall experience. The entire team demonstrated professionalism and genuine care for their patients' well-being.

I left the clinic feeling grateful to have found such a reliable and trustworthy dental practice. I highly recommend Root canal foundation to anyone seeking top-notch dental care.

tags: None
review: Great beyond words.i m one of those people who have had to go to the dentist since infancy probably and i have a terrible dentist phobia...i would prolong visiting a dentist as long as possible.. and only go when i had no other choice....really scared and ready to cry and scream...i never thought i would visit a dentist for an rct alone and confident of a painfree ,comfortable treatment.A doctor's smile and patience goes a long way in treating a patient.I must appreciate the wonderful person Dr Gopikrishna is in addition to his professional excellence.He gives you a very patient hearing and then explains the options...the pain is minimal..  of the thinnest possible dental needle ever..and thereafter u can watch a television on the ceiling as he ********** *** painlessly completes the procedure...** ****** ** *** ****** More than anything...i cant thank you enough Dr Gopikrishna for alleviating my fear of visiting a dentist....something that has deeply troubled me all my life. Thank You sir.

review: During my initial visit to the Root-canal Foundation, I was impressed by the immaculate cleanliness of the facility. The reception staff exhibited exceptional politeness and professionalism, promptly calling me in for treatment at the scheduled time. The doctor, not only friendly but highly skilled, took the time to thoroughly explain the treatment and precautions, avoiding unnecessary procedures like root canals. Overall, a delightful experience with a truly smile-inducing atmosphere.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: When I had a dental issue way back in 2016 I was advised by his student Dr.Wasim to consult Dr.Gopikrishna .From then on all my dental issues are well taken care of with no tensions.His diagnosis are perfect and well explained to me.His clinic is well equipped with the latest equipment and very hygienic and well maintained .Where ever I am when it comes to dental issues all I can think of is Root Canal clinic and my doc Gopikrishna.I strongly recommend Dr.Gopikrishna to my family and friends.I must say a big thanks to Dr.Wasim..And thank you Dr.Gopikrishna for saving most of my teeth üëçI am happy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
My best experience for a dental treatment so far. I am so glad to have found this place. The doctors are extremely open and explains the issues in detail. The X-rays were also explained to me. The treatment was extremely comfortable and quick considering the complexity of the surgery I had to go through.

After my RCT, the crown fixing was done in a very non-invasive manner. A 3D print of my teeth quadrant was taken using some special equipment without using any mold.

I had to travel 24 kms for each visit and made a total of 5 visits! But it was all worth it. The safety protocols followed by the team is highly commendable and I felt at ease as soon as I entered their premise. Special thanks to the entire team for offering their services during the pandemic and lock-down situations.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Treatment during covid can be scary but it was all very well managed. 
Gloves, face mask and hand sanitizer are placed at the entrance. Gloves are for those who are to be treated. 
Seats have been alternatively blocked in the spirit of social distancing. Purses and other objects (cell phones) have to be placed in designated trays. 
Once you are up for examination, an oral mouth wash is given as an antibacterial. Spitting is only permitted in designated cups owing to the existing situation. 
Since the last time I have been to the place the doctor sent a copy of the x ray to my email which I liked.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Root CANAL FOUNDATION for the first time on the recommendation of my daughter Dr.Lulua Tembey who is an Endodontist. from Mumbai I was skeptical about traveling from parrys to Anna Nagar in this Lockdown period but I am glad that I took her advice as Dr.Gopi Krishna is an experienced and skillful clinician.All the procedure were explained clearly and completed in two sittings and painlessly.I would recommend Root canal foundation for its cleanliness,hygiene and pleasant ambience and most importantly for the expertise of Dr.Gopikrishna.Thank you Doctor for taking care of me as my daughter would have taken care of me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Overall, a great experience at Root Canal Foundation. Dr Gopi Krishna was very empathetic to my late Sunday night messages when I was in pain with a severe gum infection. He saw me the first thing the next morning (he actually came in earlier than when his clinic starts seeing patients so that he could review my case). The clinic is very clean and has a warm ambience. Dr Gopi explained the issue to me very clearly and took his time to do the RCT so that my tooth could be saved. Every single time I went back to him, he and his staff were on hand to make me comfortable and make my treatment successful. This is my first RCT and I felt very little discomfort throughout the whole procedure.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Old filling was renewed by the doctor view persistent pressure and temp sensitivity. Doctor explained the reason of pressure sensitivity despite high point correction as tooth being small the filling area being close to nerves. So he removed the earstwhile filling of best material and advised to go for one grade down filling which may resolve problem. This seems to work for me as since two days I have not felt any sensitivity with the new filling. Treatment and monitoring is ongoing for another of my deep filling.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: It was a nice experience, even though Mr.Gopinath expert and very experienced person his approach with patients are very excellent and outstanding.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Very caring and friendly. Explains the procedure in detail. Keeps appointment time.

tags: None
review: Right from the start of booking an appointment to date where my treatment is an ongoing , the whole experience has just been excellent. I had a whopping 5 RCT , 2 Dental Implants and numerous fillings to do as I had suffered from a condition called Gingivitis during my pregnancy. *** ********* ********** *** *******, I did not even feel the needle going in. He explains every procedure in laymen terms and gives choices where appropriate, not at all pushy unlike so many other dentists. Needless to say that all my friends and family are definitely headed his way whenever they need any dental treatment. Its not only him but his entire team which deserves undoubted appreciation. I would like to mention Dr.Lakshmi and her assurance whenever I was in pain. An awesome listener and an empathiser. A pat on the back for the entire team. Please keep up the good work

tags: None
review: Clean and efficient Clinic,  CCTV monitored , including a coffee dispensing machine. The reception was helpful.  With the Doctor, as an NRI, my interaction was perfect.  A very practical man, he weighed the pros and cons and took a decision not to conduct a surgery on my 12 year old son.  He explained to me why and why not.  I took him to show my son who had a tendency" protruding of jaw.".  You see, I wanted a judgement and I valued his judgement.  Thank You Doctor Gopi Krishna.  For sure, I will come and meet you next year.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Excellent safety measures - on entering asked to use sanitizer and wear gloves and seating was nicely marked, alternate, wait time limited to 5 minutes. In the meantime, checked body temperature and oxygen level and covid form to fill. sInside the clinic - Doctor himself and attendor were wearing PPE, gloves, face shielids and head gear, gave an anti viral rinse to gargle. Overall a pleasant experience - Thank you doc

tags: None
review:
I had visited Dr Gopi Krishna for an annual dental checkup. During this checkup he determined that my enamel was wearing off. He scheduled another session to address this with a filling.
He performed the procedure very professionally. He had a very pleasing personality and clearly explained everything to me.
His clinic is very much unlike a Dentist's clinic. The architecture is quite modern, which makes the waiting time less exasperating.

The fees are quite reasonable and on par with prevailing market rates for similar procedures.

I'd recommend him to anyone.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Gopi Krishna has state of art facilities at his clinic. When other doctors advised root canal for filling a big hole in my molar, he advised that he could solve the issue without root canal treatment. And Yes, he did it by using effective imported permanent filling and he did it through microscope, which is not common in Chennai. The clinic is very clean and his assistants are highly professional. The costs are reasonable. *** ********* *** ********* ** ***** ******

reply_text: Thank you for your kind words of appreciation !! We definitely walk our talk and we will look forward to living upto your faith and patience !!!

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review: Just did one tooth filling today and all went fine till I received a bill of 2700/- ....For a 20 min job (that too one sitting), this was the highest ever bill I laid for a normal ceramic filling job.. Hope others won't get this wrong. But, I can recommend this doctor, if you are looking for some serious / expert job.
reply_text:
Thank you for the feedback ! A Class 2 composite filling is probably the toughest restorative procedure that we do and thats why it is kept as an clinical exam procedure in masters program in restorative dentistry !!
Rest assured you have paid for both good materials employed and better clinical acumen!!!

tags: Wait time,
review:
I had to wait for an hour to get attended to even after taking an appointment.
how can they do this ?
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback ! We are very particular at keeping up both our professional work integrity and work ethics. Unfortunately on rare occassions like what you had experienced  we could not attend onto you at the prescribed time as the previous procedure went on much longer than anticipated. We regret the inconvenience caused. 
Best regards 
Team Root Canal Foundation
